channel.title: Housekeepin'
channel.itunes:subtitle: This is a reviews based podcast hosted by Gaff, Colm & Johnny
channel.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
channel.itunes:summary: Welcome to the binge drinking lucky bag of podcasts that we call Housekeepin
channel.description: This is a reviews based podcast hosted by Gaff, Colm & Johnny where we discuss everything and nothing.

item.title: HouseKeepin' 62 - Three grumpy bears go to space
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: The thinking lady's bit of crumpet Tony fills in for Johnny this week to join the lads on a magical tour full of booze, their thoughts and a lot of talk of space.
item.itunes:summary: Yes this is rather short intro but some of us have very very sore heads but enjoy my little tenants of housekeepin'

item.title: HouseKeepin' 61 - Housekeepin' The Events
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: A magic filled podcast this week as the gang come over all Derren Brown-y and attempt his remote viewing experiment live on the cast, will it work?
item.itunes:summary: Well you're going to have to tune in and find out.

item.title: HouseKeepin' 60 - Love Cats
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: In which the guys accidently find gay porn....
item.itunes:summary: ...enough said really

item.title: HouseKeepin' 59 - Yoda, You Seek Yoda
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: Word up Housekeepers! We trust you’re well. What is going on in this amazing episode of Housekeepin, I hear you ask? Well we shall tell you.
item.itunes:summary: This time the boys cover not being able to chat up girls (as normal) and slag off people who didn’t like the last Indiana Jones movie, why? Because you’re all crazy thats why.

item.title: HouseKeepin' 58 - Mommy is a Time Traveling Robot
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: Its been a long time coming, a long time coming home The Delays sang, most likely about lost love or hopeful love, they probably did not mean Housekeepin but its nice to...
item.itunes:summary: Yes its been a very long time since the boys sat down together, but oh its like they have never been away.

item.title: HouseKeepin' 57 - Zombie Dawn
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: Whats this? Two podcasts one day? Like two girls one cup only with even more sick, poo and regret.
item.itunes:summary: After the last installment of Housekeepin' saw the Lord of the Rings epic that was the G-unit cast...

item.title: HouseKeepin' 56 - G Unit in Therapy
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: This week two of the boys have the week off so its left to the remaining gentleman to round up his college friends that are collectively known as 'G- unit'.
item.itunes:summary: The self proclaimed gods of women use the very long podcast to among other things dish out advice on women , get rated looks wise by housekeepin legend Tara...

item.title: HouseKeepin' 55 - Wank T.A.R.D.I.S.
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: This week the boys return to the medium of podcasts much to the disappointment of the all the females fans of the video cast.
item.itunes:summary: Its your normal lucky bag of gems that you have come to expect after a years worth of nonsense only joined by this weeks returning guest host Ruairi.

item.title: HouseKeepin' 54 - A rose by any other name
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: The boys return this week and have been up to all sorts. One of them was rocking in england, another was dressing up in Holland and another was becoming Dave Fanning.
item.itunes:summary: Yes the boys talk about festivals in Maastricht where Colm became a dandy and danced with two of the four turtles while drinking tiny beers and Gaff's stupid loud and never closing mouth has somehow landed him a show on the radio (89.5fm thursdays at 12 ....oh yes).

item.title: HouseKeepin' 53 - Season Premiere
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: Uncureable Tuberculosis, the days before the internet and housekeepin, three things people never wanted to return to.
item.itunes:summary: Sadly one of them as returned, no not T.B. (you just cough when you walk because you spend all day on the internet..) and the internet is still here (you're reading this and see last comment) , yes everyone Housekeepin is back.
item.itunes:keywords: Housekeepin, Gaff, Johnny, Colm, new Season

item.title: HouseKeepin' 52 - Inside the Podcasters Studio
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: Welcome to a very special episode of Housekeepin, yes to celebrate the first birthday of the comedy super ship the boys join the likes the Kevin Spacey , Robert DiNiro and Snoop D O double G in the actors studio, well kind of.
item.itunes:summary: Yes under the leadership of our guest interviewer the boys have to delve into their pasts and pull out the big answers that everyone has been dying to know. If you ever wondered such things as how the boys deal with tension, where would be the dream place to record and who is the secret behind the shows success (thats answered three times, mainly by the one source).
item.itunes:keywords: Housekeepin, Gaff, Johnny, Colm, Actors Studios

item.title: HouseKeepin' 51 - Gozer Strip
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: Much to the delight of the public the land lords return with more fun.
item.itunes:summary: Sure they have let their ‘doing one every week’ rule go down the pisser , but rules are made to be broken, because if they weren’t we might as well live in China or some class of Robotic metropolis , and the land lords will not stand for that.

item.title: HouseKeepin' 50 - Christmas Review 2008
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: So the boys are back from their Christmas break fatter from rose over eating but happy, and it’s a bumper double episode (kind of).
item.itunes:summary: Yes first up this week the boys , like the first ever pod cast, send their critical eyes over the Christmas just past. The gang discuss is detail about all the little things that made their Christmas merry from the gifts to the best thing about the day, the TV.

item.title: HouseKeepin' 49 - Selection box of comedy
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: Oh hello, whats this? Two episodes uploaded on the one night?
item.itunes:summary: Either we are very lazy and didn't bother last week or the Christmas spirit has come over us and we thought 'Lets reward the people by giving them double helpings of everyones favorite Christmas trio since Joseph, Mary and be wombed Jesus".
item.itunes:keywords: Housekeepin, Gaff, Johnny, Colm, Selection Box

item.title: HouseKeepin' 48 - A knob a second
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: The most horrid feeling from ones childhood is after seeing the Toy Show on the Late Late show is seeing it the next Friday, all back to normal and serious.
item.itunes:summary: For housekeeping however, we never take a drop in tone, but a drop in quality is another thing altogether. Yes everything returns to normal this week with just three boys and a microphone keeping you company.

item.title: HouseKeepin' 47 - The Toy Show
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: It's the show that everyone looks forward to from kids aged one to ninety two, yes its 'The Toy Show'.
item.itunes:summary: The show where uncle Pat wheels some toys out in front of children and then cruelly takes them away, yes its well and truly Christmas. On the flip side however the 'Housekeepin Toy Show' is a show that, even in its first year, no one looks forward to.

item.title: HouseKeepin' 46 - Love Thy Monster (and Gaff please)
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: What do the leaders of the free world trying to sort the current economic crisis, Santa Clause and pirates trying to hide an oil tanker under an X have in common?
item.itunes:summary: They all have a bloody hard job to do, but not as hard as it is to try and describe this weeks podcast. Yes the boys jump around so much its almost as 'House of Pain' them selves were in the room.

item.title: HouseKeepin' 45 - Return of the Mac and or Johnny
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: Well it was a long time coming, but the trio are reunited once again, yes Johnny has been tagged and allowed to reenter the wild.
item.itunes:summary: He comes back fully loaded with stories from his travels, which seem to revolve around touching things, but don't the best stories always do? Yes Johnny touched all kinds of things, including something that most of us have only touched in our dreams..well some dreams.

item.title: HouseKeepin' 44 - Executive Crunk
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: One of the gang is still away so this week the educated one and the foppish one are joined by a brace of young ladies, its almost like the playboy mansion only with two idiots making cock jokes in the corner.
item.itunes:summary: First up this week the gang discuss everyones favorite hero, James Bond and attempt to find out the age old question of do girls want to go up and be bond girls, and I think we are all hoping the answer is yes, because lets face it, bond girls be eaaasssyyyy (yes this description did just try and sound hip hop).

item.title: HouseKeepin' 43 - Halloween ( in a scottish accent)
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: Welcome to the housekeepin halloween special, expect the normal chills and frights that you normally get with halloween only with a bucket of nonsense tossed on it
item.itunes:summary: Firstly the boys use the ghost of Halloweens past to try and figure out why the holiday now means so little to them and try to see when they first turned into the grumpy haters of all things involving tricks and or treats.

item.title: HouseKeepin' 42 - Tone Deaf
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: Over coming a problem with the sound the gang and the new boy Tony return for more nonsense
item.itunes:summary: First up this week the gang minus one get to know their guest presenter , Tony. This as always turns out to be more complicated than it should as they end up chatting about old tv and shooting aliens.
item.itunes:keywords: Housekeepin, Gaff, Johnny, Colm, added, Tony

item.title: HouseKeepin' 41 - Confessions of a Dangerous Landlord
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: The boys return in the now officially prize losing pod cast with more nonsense than the plot of eagle eye.
item.itunes:summary: First up for the boys this week they attempt to make up for last weeks drunken feel up of a pod cast and get down to some serious talk, this goes by the way side in record time as they quickly change to talking about confession box habits.

item.title: HouseKeepin' 40 - Squatchcast
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: They say life beings at 40, but we're not in the business of pleasing housewives who have chosen to stay at home so we can safely say that that phrase is wrong.
item.itunes:summary: This week the boys set their sights on debunking the top ten things that can not be explained by science, however the boys get caught up when discussing the wonder of big foot, which is fair when you think one of them is quite hairy, legendary and famous.
item.itunes:keywords: Housekeepin, Gaff, Johnny, Colm, Big Foot

item.title: HouseKeepin' 39 - Shockers and Spandex
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: What can you do in 40 hours? Perhaps watch all the saw movies twice or play the 'Just a minute Quiz' 2400 times, though what we recommend is listening to this weeks show 40 times, because its just that good.
item.itunes:summary: This week the boys talk about the much misunderstood the shocker. The shocker is kind of like marmite, you either love it or you hate it, only if you love it you may very well have a whole bag of issues that a simple comedy podcast cant help with.

item.title: HouseKeepin' 38 - Need a podcast Nifty
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: Minds coming together to discuss not the just the important matters that face our world but possibly its very future. No not the American presidential debate silly, its another burst of housekeepin the dip dap of podcasts.
item.itunes:summary: The week's episode is dominated by the greatest invention of all time, no not the wheel or the MRI machine, but the 11850 text a question service.

item.title: HouseKeepin' 37 - Housekeepin at 10
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: So in a week where the current economic climate saw the reappearance of Black Monday which for many will mean a bleak or uncertain future, I think its time for the failed circle jerk of podcasts to strike once again.
item.itunes:summary: This week the budget flight to nonsense first deals with the issue of real life super villains, though this is about as successful as the bay of pigs.

item.title: HouseKeepin' 36 - Version 2.0
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: The boys aren't just back they are back and improved.
item.itunes:summary: New format for Housekeepin this week enjoy.

item.title: HouseKeepin' 35 - Gynoid
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: This week its a tale of two podcasts
item.itunes:summary: The gang talk about banging cyborgs and screwing catwomen...

item.title: HouseKeepin' 34 - One Hundred Million to One
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: Another week another dollar.
item.itunes:summary: Not for the housekeepin boys though because they don't charge and anyway dollars are no good to them because they choose to use housebucks as their official currency.

item.title: HouseKeepin' 33 - G Fresh and the Bad Buzz Bandits
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: This week the boys put the nonsense talk of space jails and magic clocks behind them and talk about their past and future.
item.itunes:summary: The boys talk about how they met and how it lead to this Bugatti veyron of podcasts that you know and love (probably).

item.title: HouseKeepin' 32 - Jesus has a Time Clock
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: This week the boys return but bring with them two Laura's and the mysterious Gallery.
item.itunes:summary: The gang discuss many a thing including more e-mails (because there always interesting and thought provoking, in some ways) and do a marketing tool to improve the fortunes of a failing beer company, thats right the housekeepin' boys are taste makers.
item.itunes:keywords: Housekeepin, Gaff, Johnny, Colm, Time, Clock

item.title: HouseKeepin' 31 - Quadrichial
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: This weeks podcast takes a darker tone as it deals with the two of the most potentialy devestating things that can happen to a person, a night out with Gaff and death
item.itunes:summary: The boys discuss a recent night out where in order to improve pulling power turned to the invading russian army of charm that is the Style

item.title: HouseKeepin' 30 - Spacecast
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: The hapless housekeepin triplets return with a brand new adventure involving all kinds of nonsense.
item.itunes:summary: The boys firstly turn to you, the normal everyday lesser (no offense) people, for your e-mails.

item.title: HouseKeepin' 29 - Titlash
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: This week sees the greatest reunion since a certain bunch of boys clapped eyes on himself on Easter Sunday.
item.itunes:summary: Yes the landlords are all together again and talking about everything French related. Paris is a city of a culture, full of art and history so the gentlemen focus their discussions on the two greatest areas of these, roller coasters and boobs.

item.title: HouseKeepin' 28 - Winecast
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: This week the podcast takes on a new format...a classy format.
item.itunes:summary: The classy topics discussed in this podcast include wine (naturally), Oxegen, the Seabreeze festival, multiple Housekeepin Top Tips, amazing BBC studies and the demise of the hometown.

item.title: HouseKeepin' 27 - Dyslexia (Yes thats how you spell it)
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: This week the boys talk about everything festival related.
item.itunes:summary: Over come with jealousy about all the 'normal' people attending the oxygen music festival the boys talk about all their best festival memories.

item.title: HouseKeepin' 26 - Housekeepin' 101
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: This week sees the boys (and girl) have the very first session of housekeepin room 101.
item.itunes:summary: Here after shamelessly stealing the format from the popular BBC show the gang decide what should and what should not be cast into a place so dark, cold and lonely it resembles the Saturday night of the average housekeepin fan ( Joking of course, you're very much loved).

item.title: HouseKeepin' 25 - Colm gets Naked
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: The boys from the east coast roll again this week.
item.itunes:summary: Topics include one of the gang being on a beach naked with 2000 other people, kinda like Dunkirk only with less Nazi aerial attacks but more breasts, the topic of how amazing hand dryers are and a wee bit about mammys, bless.

item.title: HouseKeepin' 24 - Getting Acquainted with Style
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: This week sees one of the gang watching far too much of explorer, hard ass bastard and all round good guy Bear Grylls and his born survivor show, this prompts the boys to discuss everything jungle related.
item.itunes:summary: This week sees one of the gang watching far too much of explorer, hard ass bastard and all round good guy Bear Grylls and his born survivor show, this prompts the boys to discuss everything jungle related.

item.title: HouseKeepin' 23 - This podcast is as lousy as it is brilliant
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: The number 23 a terrible film with Jim Carrey but a damm fine episode of a podcast with the housekeepin boys.
item.itunes:summary: This week sees the boys try to remember a recent birthday which ended up in a lot of drunken phone calls, how old 'would you go' and hair on things where they were should never be any hair...ever.

item.title: HouseKeepin' 22 - Outcast
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: This week sees the boys leave the home comforts of housekeepin' HQ and set out into the wild (ish) for some fun, sun and beer all in the name of the first ever out-cast.
item.itunes:summary: This week sees the boys leave the home comforts of housekeepin' HQ and set out into the wild (ish) for some fun, sun and beer all in the name of the first ever out-cast.

item.title: HouseKeepin' 21 - Drunk, Angry and Political
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: Another week, another hour of intelligent banter and not so intelligent drivel in equal measures from the housekeepin' boys.
item.itunes:summary: This week sees one of the boys growing a beard for medical reasons, the greatness of reddit, the rather compromising lyrics of J - pop and also, if we are being honest, down right harsh opinions of women.

item.title: HouseKeepin' 20 - How to lose fans and alienate people
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: This week finds the housekeepin boys engrossed in the twin topics of dolphins and masturbation.
item.itunes:summary: This week finds the housekeepin boys engrossed in the twin topics of dolphins and masturbation.

item.title: HouseKeepin' 19 - Tangents
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: This weeks podcast resembles ugg boots, chlamydia and the polish community in the sense that it is all over the place. The summer sun must have gone to our boys head because they cover probably very topic of conversation of all time.
item.itunes:summary: This weeks podcast resembles ugg boots, chlamydia and the polish community in the sense that it is all over the place. The summer sun must have gone to our boys head because they cover probably very topic of conversation of all time.

item.title: HouseKeepin' 18 - Super Mario Lovers
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: This week sees the action return to normal as the Housekeepin' team becomes a trio once again.
item.itunes:summary: A highly philosophical podcast this time where the boys find them selves asking the huge questions in life.

item.title: HouseKeepin' 17 - Uncuntingbelievable
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: This weeks adventure sees the boys chillin' out maxin' relaxin' all cool with some friends.
item.itunes:summary: This weeks adventure sees the boys chillin' out maxin' relaxin' all cool with some friends. We get to see the return of last weeks guest host Laura but she's also joined by fellow dangerously sexy accent-ed Finto and making her long awaited housekeepin' debut , Colm's better half, the very lovely and future bond girl (it may happen) Christina. There is a cornucopia of topics brought to the table with everyone being in a story telling mood. The boys (and now two girls) talk about everything from the loneliness felt by the non GTA 4 player, self love (and not the normal narcissistic black slapping self love that normal is the back bone of the podcast), how one of the gang has had their identity stolen by an Italian super villain and the power of an ileostomy bag. Another extra long show today which is good news for fans but bad news for the people who listen to the show still hoping for housekeepin' tips , but hey thats what they made UK style for.

item.title: HouseKeepin' 16 - Tonight Live and Sold Out
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: This weeks adventure sees many changes for the housekeepin' trio as not only do they allow a studio audience in their humble abode they are also joined by the ever so charming and northern guest presenter Laura.
item.itunes:summary: This weeks adventure sees many changes for the housekeepin' trio as not only do they allow a studio audience in their humble abode they are also joined by the ever so charming and northern guest presenter Laura. Features on this show see Gaff taking on the role of Bamber Gascoigne with a quiz attempting to see how well you can know a person just by hearing them talk nonsense on a podcast every week, the boys (and girl) take on the role of diplomats to take on the most important area of the northern irish peace process since the Good Friday agreement (it may involve just tasting drinks, but what can you do?) and also the role of John Bowman as they take part in a Q and A session with the audience. Everything as normal seems to go a little bit wrong though for our boys (and girl - again). Enjoy!

item.title: HouseKeepin' 15 - Emergency Procedures
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: In a week of fall outs , both between two of our boys and of the nuclear kind.
item.itunes:summary: In a week of fall outs , both between two of our boys and of the nuclear kind. This weeks podcast sees your favourite trio discuss knees to the face, the upcoming Housekeepin' charity song to raise funds for a 4000 Euro whiskey that they may share with a lucky homeless man and give the housekeepin' answer to the government's recent "Preparing for Major Emergencies" booklet.

item.title: HouseKeepin' 14 - Shotcast
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: The first inaugural shotcast in our new Housekeepin' bar, why don't you drop by some time! Twenty questions included and it is MANDATORY to drink while listening to this podcast MANDATORY!!!
item.itunes:summary: The first inaugural shotcast in our new Housekeepin' bar, why don't you drop by some time! Twenty questions included and it is MANDATORY to drink while listening to this podcast MANDATORY!!!

item.title: HouseKeepin' 13 - Housekeepin' Fact or Fiction
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: Number 13 unlucky for some or one??? We ask the question now that Gaff is no longer with us, is there a reason why we can't continue and talk about great things such as his demise, fact or fiction and the winner of our competition - Tony!
item.itunes:summary: Number 13 unlucky for some or one??? We ask the question now that Gaff is no longer with us, is there a reason why we can't continue and talk about great things such as his demise, fact or fiction and the winner of our competition - Tony!

item.title: HouseKeepin' 12 - The Miracle of Titty Bars
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: Active conversations about Turtles, power rangers, saints and how Gaff is slowly dying oh and the spread of AdeZ... Competition Anounnuced!!!
item.itunes:summary: Active conversations about Turtles, power rangers, saints and how Gaff is slowly dying oh and the spread of AdeZ... Competition Anounnuced!!!

item.title: HouseKeepin' 11 - Gaff has a Brain Tumor
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: Discussing the aftermath of Paddys Day and the ultimate question, thats right "What if..." Also featuring talk about Digg Reddit and Bootleg woman in the US.
item.itunes:summary: Discussing the aftermath of Paddys Day and the ultimate question, thats right "What if..." Also featuring talk about Digg Reddit and Bootleg woman in the US.

item.title: HouseKeepin' 10 - Paddcast
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: Super Special Paddys Day podcast featuring Derren Brown and Seoige and O Shea (Only in discussion not actually on podcast). Also a discussion of the milestone that is ourtenth podcast and the Arklow Paddys day parade.
item.itunes:summary: Super Special Paddys Day podcast featuring Derren Brown and Seoige and O Shea (Only in discussion not actually on podcast). Also a discussion of the milestone that is ourtenth podcast and the Arklow Paddys day parade.

item.title: HouseKeepin' 9 - Home Sweet Homeless
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: Hungover discussions on Homeless people, cookin, gay bar visits and black exploitation
item.itunes:summary: Hungover discussions on Homeless people, cookin, gay bar visits and black exploitation

item.title: HouseKeepin' 8 - Gaffs Teeth the More You Know
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: A very drunk trio welcome the return of Colm and get back to some beer drinking and reviewing
item.itunes:summary: A very drunk trio welcome the return of Colm and get back to some beer drinking and reviewing

item.title: HouseKeepin' 7 - Two Guys a Girl and a Podcast
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: The one where Colm is in Italy and Tara comes to visit...
item.itunes:summary: This sees Gaff Johnny and Tara destroy Colm's hard work, order and reputation while he is abroad. Topics include womens perspective, loose women, kerry katona, super sweet 16 and Gaffs jingles...

item.title: HouseKeepin' 6 - Time Clock
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: The 6th podcast a momentous occasion.....no drinking....but hungover....The topic Time, Clocks, Religeon, Jermey Clarkson, Action-Figure Gaff and of course "girl who you dated in Secondary School". Also a non Dublin podcast!
item.itunes:summary: The 6th podcast a momentous occasion.....no drinking....but hungover....The topic Time, Clocks, Religeon, Jermey Clarkson, Action-Figure Gaff and of course "girl who you dated in Secondary School". Also a non Dublin podcast!
item.itunes:keywords: Housekeepin, Gaff, Johnny, Colm, Time, Clock

item.title: HouseKeepin' 5 - Resuming Normal Service
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: Its the magic number......not really but it is the 5th podcast. We review a few beers, try our first podcast shot, discuss some crazy shit but you have to listen to find out what it is.
item.itunes:summary: Its the magic number......not really but it is the 5th podcast. We review a few beers, try our first podcast shot, discuss some crazy shit but you have to listen to find out what it is.
item.itunes:keywords: Housekeepin, Gaff, Johnny, Colm, Resuming, Normal, Service

item.title: HouseKeepin' 4 - Ancillary Intercourse
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: The 4th podcast in our lil lifespan and its possibly the most action packed so far. We discuss Beer, Chinese work ethic, sex and Obesity.......mainly Gaffs. Enjoy!
item.itunes:summary: The 4th podcast in our lil lifespan and its possibly the most action packed so far. We discuss Beer, Chinese work ethic, sex and Obesity.......mainly Gaffs. Enjoy!
item.itunes:keywords: Housekeepin, Gaff, Johnny, Colm, Ancillary Intercourse

item.title: HouseKeepin' 3 - Man of 2008
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: In this adventure, we discuss our new found 'liveness', Unions, TV and more importantly nominate our Man of at least one year.
item.itunes:summary: In this adventure, we discuss our new found 'liveness', Unions, TV and more importantly nominate our Man of at least one year.
item.itunes:keywords: Housekeepin, Gaff, Johnny, Colm, Man of 2008

item.title: HouseKeepin' 2 - Christmas 2007 Review
item.itunes:author: Housekeepin'
item.itunes:subtitle: Podcast number 2 see's a very long drink filled discussion of the Christmas period and our first beer review.
item.itunes:summary: Podcast number 2 see's a very long drink filled discussion of the Christmas period and our first beer review.
item.itunes:keywords: Housekeepin, Gaff, Johnny, Colm, Christmas, Review, 2008
